The Serenity of Faith

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w loud|strong="H8085"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w graciously|strong="H2603"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*.
